padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkiWH6IH7"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "B1ob-C8BQ"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SyXGZA8S7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ByHSW08SX"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SkW6WC8S7"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag396bba13w5f"]

A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/spyro-lite/blog-demo-1/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2018/08/exp-blog-002.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" max_width= '{"d":"100%"}' rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" custom_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" drop_shadow= "drop-shadow(0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0))" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "1" placeholder_bg= "rgba(238,238,238,1)" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" padding= '{"d":""}' margin= '{"d":""}' key= "fuag396ck62i7w4q"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag396d8taf2abe"]

Smartphone penertration is growing by 2000% each year

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag396g3kd6lzid"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag396gtrfvfcg7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag396hk278roj0"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag396ic89dz4ww"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

Smartphone penertration is growing by 2000% each year

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

"fuag396bba13w5f"]

A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/corporate/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/08/exp-blog-002.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "1" placeholder_bg= "rgba(238,238,238,1)" image_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' key= "fuag396ck62i7w4q"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396d8taf2abe"]

Smartphone penertration is growing by 2000% each year

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396g3kd6lzid"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396gtrfvfcg7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396hk278roj0"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396ic89dz4ww"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease. Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike. 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkiWH6IH7"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's
One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "B1ob-C8BQ"]
OS that's improving each year
Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SyXGZA8S7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections
Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ByHSW08SX"]
Video and Content Streaming
Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SkW6WC8S7"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience
Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ? A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkiWH6IH7"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "B1ob-C8BQ"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SyXGZA8S7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ByHSW08SX"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SkW6WC8S7"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkiWH6IH7"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's
One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "B1ob-C8BQ"]
OS that's improving each year
Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SyXGZA8S7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections
Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ByHSW08SX"]
Video and Content Streaming
Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SkW6WC8S7"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience
Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ? A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

n

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

n

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "B1ob-C8BQ"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ? A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

n

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

n

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's
n

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkiWH6IH7"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "B1ob-C8BQ"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SyXGZA8S7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ByHSW08SX"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SkW6WC8S7"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "S1gMdgIbIX"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= "rgba(250,250,250,1)" bg_image= "http://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/corporate/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/08/exp-blog-26.jpg" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"70px 50px 70px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "1" overlay_color= "rgba(0,0,0,0.55)" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "0" box_shadow_custom= "0 0 15px 0 rgba(198,202,202,0.4)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "BJMdeU-8m"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 20px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "r1v_xL-L7"]

The best smartphone of 2018
iPhoneX or Samsung S9+

We are on the verge of the next green revolution. Except this time it is being driven by robots. A number of IOT devices are being developed that can automate most of the processes. Drones to monitor crop quality, pests, water levels etc enhacing farm output.
[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag2v4meo4q1hdo"]

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag2v4r594wouka"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag2v4s3k6peocf"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag2v4stq5l5fr6"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag2v4tjydh6733"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" typography= '{"d":""}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_style= '{"d":"solid","l":"solid","t":"solid","m":"solid"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" border_radius= "0px" hide_in= "" css_id= "" css_classes= "" animate= "1" animation_type= "none" animation_delay= "0" animation_duration= "300" key= "fuag2v4ucb7tyhel"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

Farm output is doubling each year

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

"fuag2v4r594wouka"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2v4s3k6peocf"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/corporate/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/08/exp-blog-022.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "1" placeholder_bg= "rgba(238,238,238,1)" image_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' key= "fuag2v4q62d3mr8f"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2v4stq5l5fr6"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2v4tjydh6733"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2v4ucb7tyhel"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fuag2v4va7fpudds"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= '{"id":"palette:0","color":"rgba(34,147,215,1)"}' bg_image= "" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"50px 50px 50px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "0" overlay_color= "" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "1" box_shadow_custom= "0px 5px 30px 0px rgba(214,215,216,0.57)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fuag2v4xsgfkg5wu"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2v4xwsb8o98v"]

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's
One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dwzpmainmcp"]
OS that's improving each year
Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx10kd895rn"]
Gigabit 5G Connections
Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" bg_color= "" border_radius= "0" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fuag2dx5ah2f49k7"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= "rgba(250,250,250,1)" bg_image= "https://brandexponents.com/spyro-lite/blog-demo-1/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2018/08/exp-blog-031.jpg" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "center center" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"70px 50px 70px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border_radius= "0" border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "1" overlay_color= "rgba(0,0,0,0.4)" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "0" box_shadow_custom= "0 0 15px 0 rgba(198,202,202,0.4)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fuag2dx9om3t2tef"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 20px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx9wofawza1"]

Oculus Pro set us debut in CES 2019

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_button button_text= "See the specs" url= "" new_tab= "0" type= "medium" button_style= "circular" alignment= "center" bg_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' hover_bg_color= "" color= '{"id":"palette:2","color":"rgba(49,50,51,1)"}' hover_color= "" border_width= "0" border_color= "" hover_border_color= "" icon= "" icon_alignment= "left" lightbox= "0" image= "" video_url= "" hover_effect= "none" background_animation= "none" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= "0px 0px 40px 0px" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" hover_box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" key= "fuag2dxbae8nkj6t"][/tatsu_button][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx2aj43co9z"]
Video and Content Streaming
Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx3opc05gou"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience
Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ? [/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "BkWAvqbUm"]

CEO, Facebook

[/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dwuu0cur1eq"]

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dwy4b5oamb6"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dwzpmainmcp"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx10kd895rn"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" bg_color= "" border_radius= "0" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fuag2dx5ah2f49k7"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= "rgba(250,250,250,1)" bg_image= "http://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/corporate/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/08/exp-blog-031.jpg" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "center center" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"70px 50px 70px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border_radius= "0" border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "1" overlay_color= "rgba(0,0,0,0.4)" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "0" box_shadow_custom= "0 0 15px 0 rgba(198,202,202,0.4)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fuag2dx9om3t2tef"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 20px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx9wofawza1"]

Oculus Pro set us debut in CES 2019

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_button button_text= "See the specs" url= "" new_tab= "0" type= "medium" button_style= "circular" alignment= "center" bg_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' hover_bg_color= "" color= '{"id":"palette:4","color":"rgba(49,50,51,1)"}' hover_color= "" border_width= "0" border_color= "" hover_border_color= "" icon= "" icon_alignment= "left" lightbox= "0" image= "" video_url= "" hover_effect= "none" background_animation= "none" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= "0px 0px 40px 0px" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" hover_box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" key= "fuag2dxbae8nkj6t"][/tatsu_button][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx2aj43co9z"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx3opc05gou"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

[/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]

A Beautiful and Functional theme

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease. Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike. What makes Oshine one of the bestselling WordPress themes of all time ?
Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.
  • Instant Start - Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.
  • Premium Design - Over 30 high quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
  • Visual Builder - Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page & header builder.
  • Great Performance - Optimized code for blazing fast loading times. Great for SEO as well as your website visitors.
  • Simple & Powerful - Take complete control of your website using a powerful yet simple to use system, a rare combination.
  • Trustworthy -  Crafted with care by the authors of Oshine, a best seller with over 25K customers.
  • Quality Service - Get prompt responses from a friendly, professional and knowledgable support team.

A Revolutionary Fully Visual Page Builder for WordPress.

A Powerful and Elegant live front end page builder for WordPress, that comes with 50+ styling modules, a live text editor and pre-built concepts. It makes building web pages a breeze and is loved by newbies and pros alike. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" bg_color= "" border_radius= "0" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fubh6658qkg815ny"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= "rgba(246,246,246,1)" bg_image= "" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"50px 50px 50px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border_radius= "0" border= '{"d":"1px 1px 1px 1px "}' border_color= "rgba(228,228,228,1)" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "0" overlay_color= "" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "0" box_shadow_custom= "0 0 15px 0 rgba(198,202,202,0.4)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fubh665c8t1nqocu"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665cdwbwt6r5"]
Top Notch Customer Support
One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665dhp7yif3e"]
50+ Styling Modules
Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665edmbqjdn"]
Blog Layouts
Choose between masonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing. [/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665f7vbavpxe"]
Premium Slider Plugins worth $45
Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/spyro-lite/blog-demo-1/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2018/08/smartmockups_jkw9oqh9.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "4481" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" max_width= '{"d":"100%"}' rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "0" placeholder_bg= "" image_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' key= "fubh665g552rjhhf"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665h0f4xp60u"]
One Page / Single Page  websites
It is so easy to build one page websites or landing pages using Oshine. Simply build a normal page with various sections using our Tatsu page builder and link them from the main menu to have them scroll smoothly to the respective sections.  Why buy a specialised one page theme or landing page tool, when you have so many pre built pages and demos, any of which can be transformed in a single page website.  FYI our landing page has been built using our theme. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665i1eky1ic"]
Hero Sections
Stun users the moment they enter your site with a big , bold & beautiful showcase fullscreen sliders or images or background videos. Parallax and Overlays are supported [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665j032mr3u3"]
Video Backgrounds
If a picture is worth a 1000 words, then what about a video ? Communicate to your visitors quickly and efficiently using subtle background videos. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665k717r02n0"]
Developer Friendly
The numerous options in the theme ensure that you usually don't have to code anything to customize the theme. However there are cases where you may want to extend the theme's functionality and it is quite easy to do so.  The theme follows best coding  practices, provides hooks and filters that allow you to customize the code using the child theme. We have a custom CSS, JS & PHP snippet glossary with code for many common requests that we have provided to customers. The easy of use combined with the flexibility to extend / modify functionalities using custom code makes Oshine the go to theme of many agencies and professionals who develop websites for clients. [/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665lb0f09k77"]
Trusted Brand with over 20000+ customers
Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ? A Beautiful and Functional theme

n

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

n

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

What makes Oshine one of the bestselling WordPress themes of all time ?
n

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

n
    n
  • Instant Start - Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.
    • n
  • Premium Design - Over 30 high quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
    • n
  • Visual Builder - Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page & header builder.
    • n
  • Great Performance - Optimized code for blazing fast loading times. Great for SEO as well as your website visitors.
    • n
  • Simple & Powerful - Take complete control of your website using a powerful yet simple to use system, a rare combination.
    • n
  • Trustworthy -  Crafted with care by the authors of Oshine, a best seller with over 25K customers.
    • n
  • Quality Service - Get prompt responses from a friendly, professional and knowledgable support team.
    • n

Top Notch Customer Support
n

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

Premium Slider Plugins worth $45
n

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namely Slider Revolution and Master Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

One Page / Single Page  websites
n

It is so easy to build one page websites or landing pages using Oshine. Simply build a normal page with various sections using our Tatsu page builder and link them from the main menu to have them scroll smoothly to the respective sections.  Why buy a specialised one page theme or landing page tool, when you have so many pre built pages and demos, any of which can be transformed in a single page website.  FYI our landing page has been built using our theme.

Developer Friendly
n

The numerous options in the theme ensure that you usually don't have to code anything to customize the theme. However there are cases where you may want to extend the theme's functionality and it is quite easy to do so.  The theme follows best coding  practices, provides hooks and filters that allow you to customize the code using the child theme. We have a custom CSS, JS & PHP snippet glossary with code for many common requests that we have provided to customers. The easy of use combined with the flexibility to extend / modify functionalities using custom code makes Oshine the go to theme of many agencies and professionals who develop websites for clients.

n

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over 19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of the top 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?
